mapper.sql: id, `name`, pid, `type` as `type.id`, source, gender, birthday, school, major, phone, phone, qq, gxtAccount, email, wx, workAddress, password
mapper.insert: insert into staff( name, createTime, updateTime ) values( #{name}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: select from staff where email=#{email} limit 1
select from staff where id=#{id} limit 1
mapper.update: update staff set password=#{newPassword} where email=#{email} and password=#{newPassword}
mapper.select: (select c.id, 2, c.`name` as title from company c where c.`name` like '%${key}%' limit 100) union (select s.id, 1, s.`name` as title from staff s where s.`name` like '${key}%' limit 100) union (select p.id, 3, p.`name` as title from project p where p.`name` like '%${key}%' limit 100)
